item.title: Strategy Buys $2 Billion More Worth Of Bitcoin
item.description:
Strategy has purchased an additional 20,365 Bitcoin, valued at nearly $2 billion, bringing total holdings to 499,096 BTC worth approximately $33.1 billion. This acquisition advances its "21/21" plan, highlighting ongoing institutional adoption despite recent Bitcoin market volatility.

The post Strategy Buys $2 Billion More Worth Of Bitcoin appeared first on Cryptonews.
